title: BRIEF-Ligand Posts Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $1.31
text: February 21, 2018 / 9:15 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Ligand Posts Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $1.31 Reuters Staff Feb 21 (Reuters) - Ligand Pharmaceuticals Inc: * LIGAND REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.31 * Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.33 * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE ABOUT $164 MILLION * Q4 REVENUE $50.5 MILLION * ‍AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2017, LIGAND HAD CASH, CASH EQUIVALENTS AND SHORT-TERM INVESTMENTS OF $201.7 MILLION​ * ‍ESTIMATES THAT CASH EXPENSES FOR 2018 WILL BE IN RANGE OF $34 MILLION TO $35 MILLION​ * WITH REVENUE OF $164 MILLION, ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER DILUTED SHARE WOULD BE ABOUT $4.22 FOR 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
